name: Interdimensional Cleanup Corp VR
description:
Cleanup Corp VR is a room scale Vive game where you cleanup space and the sea by jumping through portals in this endless runner type game.

You are a portal traveling agent of cleanliness sent to fix the mess of the blangerbarts. Dodge, dip, dive, duck, and clean outer space and under the sea. High Commander of Interdimensional Cleanup Corp. is counting on you!

Made for the GameDevNetwork: Dragon Jam

Requires: Vive

Music:

Zazie Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
